body_html:
I am looking for tf.scatter_nd. when I am looking at log_device_placemnt it is saying that it is running in CPU. I am using tf.device to run it on GPU. The GPU version of this:
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/core/kernels/scatter_nd_op.cc#L339

body:
I am looking for tf.scatter_nd. when I am looking at log_device_placemnt it is saying that it is running in CPU. I am using tf.device to run it on GPU. The GPU version of this:
